statements: SELECT * FROM HabitatFragmentation WHERE year = 2020;
SELECT land_cover_type, area_covered_km2 FROM HabitatFragmentation WHERE year = 2019;
SELECT year, land_cover_type, area_covered_km2 FROM HabitatFragmentation WHERE area_covered_km2 > 100;
SELECT * FROM HabitatFragmentation WHERE land_cover_type = 'Forest';
SELECT year, land_cover_type FROM HabitatFragmentation WHERE year IN (2018, 2019, 2020);
SELECT year, land_cover_type, area_covered_km2 FROM HabitatFragmentation ORDER BY year DESC, area_covered_km2 ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM HabitatFragmentation WHERE year = 2020 AND area_covered_km2 > 100 ORDER BY area_covered_km2 DESC
SELECT land_cover_type, SUM(area_covered_km2) AS total_area_covered FROM HabitatFragmentation GROUP BY land_cover_type
SELECT year, land_cover_type, area_covered_km2 FROM HabitatFragmentation WHERE area_covered_km2 BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY area_covered_km2
SELECT DISTINCT land_cover_type FROM HabitatFragmentation ORDER BY land_cover_type ASC
SELECT * FROM habitats;
SELECT habitat_name, habitat_type FROM habitats ORDER BY habitat_id DESC;
SELECT habitat_name FROM habitats WHERE habitat_type = 'forest';
SELECT habitat_name, land_cover_type FROM habitats INNER JOIN land_cover_data ON habitats.habitat_id = land_cover_data.habitat_id;
SELECT habitat_id, land_cover_type FROM land_cover_data WHERE land_cover_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM habitats WHERE habitat_type = 'Forest' ORDER BY habitat_name ASC;
SELECT habitat_name, habitat_type FROM habitats WHERE habitat_type != 'Desert';
SELECT DISTINCT habitat_type FROM habitats;
SELECT habitat_name, land_cover_type FROM habitats JOIN land_cover_data ON habitats.habitat_id = land_cover_data.habitat_id;
SELECT habitat_name, land_cover_type FROM habitats JOIN land_cover_data ON habitats.habitat_id = land_cover_data.habitat_id WHERE land_cover_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT year, land_cover_label FROM habitat_fragmentation WHERE land_cover_code = 1;
SELECT land_cover_description FROM land_cover_codes WHERE land_cover_code = 2;
SELECT year, area_affected FROM habitat_changes WHERE change_type = 'deforestation';
SELECT * FROM habitat_fragmentation ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT land_cover_label, land_cover_code FROM habitat_fragmentation WHERE year = 2020;
SELECT * FROM habitat_fragmentation WHERE year = 2021;
SELECT land_cover_code, land_cover_label FROM habitat_fragmentation ORDER BY land_cover_label DESC;
SELECT year, SUM(area_affected) AS total_area_affected FROM habitat_changes GROUP BY year HAVING total_area_affected > 100;
SELECT hc.year, lc.land_cover_description, hc.change_type FROM habitat_changes hc JOIN land_cover_codes lc ON hc.land_cover_code = lc.land_cover_code;
SELECT year, AVG(area_affected) AS average_area_affected FROM habitat_changes GROUP BY year ORDER BY average_area_affected DESC;
SELECT * FROM habitat_fragmentation ORDER BY time_period DESC;
SELECT area_covered, fragmentation_level FROM habitat_fragmentation WHERE fragmentation_level > 5;
SELECT * FROM land_cover WHERE coverage BETWEEN 0.2 AND 0.5;
SELECT * FROM fragmentation_history ORDER BY fragment_density ASC;
SELECT factor_name, impact_level FROM fragmentation_factors;
SELECT time_period, area_covered, fragmentation_level FROM habitat_fragmentation WHERE area_covered > 100 ORDER BY time_period DESC;
SELECT land_type, coverage, area_covered FROM land_cover WHERE coverage BETWEEN 0.3 AND 0.6 ORDER BY land_type;
SELECT time_period, fragment_size, fragment_density FROM fragmentation_history WHERE fragment_density > 0.5 ORDER BY time_period ASC;
SELECT factor_name, impact_level FROM fragmentation_factors WHERE impact_level >= 3 ORDER BY factor_name DESC;

SELECT * FROM habitat_fragmentation JOIN land_cover ON habitat_fragmentation.time_period = land_cover.time_period WHERE habitat_fragmentation.area_covered > 50 AND land_cover.coverage < 0.5 ORDER BY habitat_fragmentation.time_period DESC;
SELECT * FROM HabitatFragmentation ORDER BY fragment_area DESC;
SELECT land_cover_type, fragment_area FROM HabitatFragmentation WHERE fragment_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT id, area_name, land_cover_type, area_coverage FROM LandCoverData WHERE land_cover_type = 'Forest';
SELECT fragment_id, impact_type, impact_description FROM FragmentationImpact WHERE impact_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT query_name, query_description FROM FragmentationQueries ORDER BY query_date DESC;
SELECT id, land_cover_type FROM HabitatFragmentation WHERE fragment_area > 1000 ORDER BY fragment_date DESC
SELECT * FROM LandCoverData WHERE survey_date >= '2021-01-01' AND area_coverage < 50
SELECT fragment_id, impact_type FROM FragmentationImpact WHERE impact_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01' ORDER BY fragment_id ASC
SELECT * FROM FragmentationHistory WHERE fragmentation_date < '2019-01-01' AND fragment_area_before <> fragment_area_after
SELECT query_name, query_description FROM FragmentationQueries ORDER BY query_date DESC
